name: assign3-spa-f2020
description: media and actors query website built by fetch the data from MovieDB through API and single page application technique.

scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist/* && mkdir ./dist/css && cp ./index.html ./dist/index.html && cp ./css/main.css ./dist/css/main.css & mkdir ./dist/js && cp ./js/main.js ./dist/js/main.js
